This is a sample text file for testing the Bronze Tier AI Assistant.

Subject: Project Update Request

Hi Team,

I need the Q4 financial report by Friday, January 24th. The report should include:
- Revenue breakdown by product line
- Expense analysis for the quarter
- Comparison with Q3 results

Please prioritize this as the board meeting is on Monday.

Budget: $15,000 allocated for this analysis.

Thanks,
John Smith
CFO
john.smith@example.com
